short_summary: Tactical man-portable robot for emergency response team operations
description: The RCMP Emergency Response Team Program and the Explosives Disposal Unit Program require a man-portable tactical robot that can be used for various emergency response operations.

full_summary:
### Tactical Man-Portable Robot for Emergency Response Team Operations
#### Solicitation Number: WS-454-4591-498

### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC-PWGSC) issues this Request for Standing Offer (RSO) on behalf of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) to supply a national Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for tactical man-portable robots for its Emergency Response Team (ERT) and Explosives Disposal Unit (EDU) programs.

#### Background
The RCMP ERT and EDU programs are responsible for responding to and resolving high-risk incidents, including hostage situations, active threats, and explosives searches/disposal. The RCMP requires a man-portable tactical robot capable of being deployed to various locations across Canada in support of these programs.

#### Solicitation Information

*   Solicitation Number: WS-454-4591-498
*   Solicitation Title: Tactical Man-Portable Robot for Emergency Response Team Operations
*   Publication Date: 2024-06-06
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-07-15 14:00:00
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Procurement Category: 
    *   Departmental: (GD)
*   Tender Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Unspsc Description:
    *   UNSPC Code: 2315 3200, Military Robot
        UNSPC Code: 31251600, Robot components
*   Trade Agreements: (applicable)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC-PWGSC)
*   Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau QC K1A 0S5
*   Contact: Kenny Seeto (SPAC) @ (TPSGC-PWGSC) @ kenny.seeto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Requirements

*   Responders must submit their offer as a package through an electronic tendering tool.
*
